definitions: relating to the outer layer of the cerebrum

examples.text: the imaging of the brain showed cortical atrophy

shortDefinitions: relating to outer layer of cerebrum

definitions: relating to an outer layer of another organ or body part such as a kidney

examples.text: the outline of the kidney is irregular due to cortical scarring

shortDefinitions: relating to outer layer of another organ or body part

definitions: relating to or forming an outer layer of tissue immediately below the epidermis of a stem or root

examples.text: a probe was inserted into cortical cells of cotton roots

shortDefinitions: relating to outer layer of tissue below epidermis of stem or root
